Candidate.Value: BandInfo must be for a Bluetooth connection.
Band does not support push service.

A non-specific error occurred while attempting to acquire the Bluetooth device service. This error can occur if the application manifest does not have the required permissions for opening the Bluetooth connection to the Microsoft Band, or if the user denies access.
An error occurred while attempting to acquire the Bluetooth device service. This error can occur if the paired device is unreachable or has become unpaired from the current host.
